item.title: The cycle path needs sweeping, 7th February
item.description:
The cycle path from junction of commerce Road and Cheltenham Road East to Arle court roundabout needs sweeping. There is lots of small bits of gravel, mud (where water collects) and debris from trees all along the path. Itâ€™s getting slippery in the wet weather and is particularly hazardous for those using road bikes. Please could it be properly swept. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Meteor Business Park, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Erosion of surface leading to tyres slipping, 7th February
item.description:
The surface at the top of Gambles Lane is being eroded and vehicles with trailers, heavy lorries, vans and cars are unable to ascend the hill (25% slope) or pass vehicles coming the other way. Tyres are slipping and clutches being burnt out. Utter Chaos !! W3W ///modifies.retained.cloud

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gambles Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bollard missing, 7th February
item.description:
Since New Road has been closed, the bollard opposite Highbank's gate has been progressively knocked over and has now disappeared, and can be found on the opposite side of the road down the lane, near to Markhuset. W3W ///hazelnuts.watches.scariest

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gambles Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Complete bollard is damaged (Non illuminating bollard or post)

item.title: Multiple bollards damaged on Gambles Lane, 7th February
item.description:
Multiple bollards damaged on Gambles Lane which is now very dangerous to road users. the bollards are there to show that there is a three foot ditch within 12 inches of the bollard. One of the photos shows a tyre track demonstrating how close vehicles are to the ditch. the Gambles Lane was designed for horse, carts and pedestrians, not 7-tonne lorries which now use it as shortcut. There is nowhere for vehicles to pass safely. W3W ///lectured.anthems.gateway

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gambles Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Complete bollard is damaged (Non illuminating bollard or post)
